reference: Delgado, A.  and  Juan  Mora (1998) “Testing non–nested semiparametric models : an application to Engel curves specification”, Journal of Applied Econometrics, 13(2), 145–162.
title: Budget Share of Food for Spanish Households
description:
Description
a cross-section from 1980
number of observations :  23972
observation :  households
country :  Spain

parameters.town:
size of the town where the household is 
placed  categorized into 5 groups: 1 for 
small towns, 5 for big ones
parameters.age: age of reference person in the household
parameters.wfood: percentage of total expenditure which the household has spent on food
